website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPhone XS is a significant step forward for iPhones, but most iPhone buyers will probably prefer the XR or the XS Max.
pros: First mainstream dual-SIM phone in the US
cons: Expensive for the size and feature set

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer
customer_reviews.text: This phone came in perfect packaging, thanks to Amazon. The phone itself was bought for my wife, who loves it. The gold colour really does look very nice and you can tell the build quality is very premium. I think the face unlock is good but they should have kept the fingerprint scanner. But then again, maybe that is the way forward! The reason why I did not give the iPhone XS a 5 star is because I think it is overpriced, despite it's quality. But that's just my opinion. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nouman Khalid

customer_reviews.title: No clarity on warranty
customer_reviews.text: Neither the microphone nor the speakers on this telephone work properly. More troublesome I don’t know how to get the warranty on it. Does it go to Apple? Nobody tells you
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend enough!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived swiftly and perfectly packaged. Adore the phone. Cannot recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Franck Horlaville

customer_reviews.title: Shiny. Gold. Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: It is all of the things you come to expect from Apple. High quality, a phone that is more NASA than NASA. And very expensive. I'd still highly recommend Apple products, and no, I'm not an Apple fanboy. I'm sure the same could be said of the top end other smartphones.
customer_reviews.author: Bluntknife

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Item came quicker than expected and everything was as expected so over all very happy with the service and product.
customer_reviews.author: Birgir stefansson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to switch to iPhone after a decade of android devices. I’m impressed, the phone is extremely smooth, the amoled screen is beautiful, the stainless steel makes it feel truly premium, all the apps on the store are brilliantly optimised and the camera is great. There is one issue, the battery life is atrocious. When using mobile data the battery just drops like a sack of potatoes. It makes it worse with apples shady practices such as not providing a fast charger in the box (plus lack of earphone adapter) Other than that it’s a solid phone.
customer_reviews.author: JW.

customer_reviews.title: Does what is says on the advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new phone as my IPhone 6 was aging. The IPhone Xs I decided on as I want to improve my photo skills. And reading up on the requirement I believe this phone has what I need I travel to Australia soon and I am good a photography so I see this phone as ideal rather then carry around a large camera.
customer_reviews.author: James Warren

customer_reviews.title: We’re stalling apple!
customer_reviews.text: Apple seem to be more about rushing out products to make more money than spending time make a decent product these days. The really to me seemed to have rushed out this iPhone the quality overall just doesn’t say apple!
customer_reviews.author: Adam29

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright...
customer_reviews.text: I like that I was able to get this on Amazon Prime Day. There are pros and cons - as always - with iPhones and I’ve had one so long that it feels easier to stay but this might be my last one. Face recognition works well, battery life is marginally better I think Apple’s iPhone is expensive and getting to be more so
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Other Dinosaur

customer_reviews.title: Instantly Faulty
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got it, it was nothing but a problem from the start. Green flickering screen and randomly shut off. Went online to get help, with preferred idea to get either a refund or replacement. Spent approximately 3 hours with a technician trying to resolve the problem (interesting how they send a faulty item and then expect you to fix it), came to the conclusion it wasn't fixable. Not allowed a Replacement for some reason. Refund takes 3 weeks. The ONLY reason I've added 2 stars is because the assistant Abegail was patient, polite and dealt with my concerns professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Bendz

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of getting huge phones, and iphone xs is perfect size. it is also blazingly fast. Yes, it is not cheap at all, but bear in mind that you can resell for a higher price that you would resell an android, so, in the end, you are not throwing away all this money in a phone, since it has good reselling.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo CASADO ARENAS

customer_reviews.title: iPhone XS model reviewed
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding phone at a very good deal price Super fast Very intelligent Easy to use Not having a home button just works! Opening a bank app and it sees your face and just opens is excellent stuff, I was hesitant to spend this much on a phone but I’m glad I did. It just does everything right. Outstanding tech and build quality 10/10
customer_reviews.author: JayniaK

customer_reviews.title: Good phone - not exciting.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited while purchasing this phone close to my birthday. It’s a forced “gift” from my better half. LoL!!! After using the phone for close to 2 months, the excitement went down by a large extent. Don’t get me wrong this is still a damn good phone. But I am not sure if this is starkly diffident from iPhone 8. Battery life is better than my 4 year old iPhone 6. Apps open slightly faster but nothing extraordinary. Overall a sequentially better phone but there is no wow factor. And I miss the home button.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced a lot.
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy and quality phone you can feel it. It has perfect analogies size of the phone and size of the display, for people that do not want big phones but want clear view of the screen. But those qualities you can find them on iPhone x also and if someone does not care to have full display screen phone then in iPhone 7 without paying 1000 pounds or so. There is no value for money here.
customer_reviews.author: Nikos S

customer_reviews.title: Worst IPhone ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this phone a few weeks and it is a nightmare. The touch screen has an intermittent fault where it just doesn’t work. Similarly intermittent faults with making / receiving calls and continuing on calls that have been made. Apple support have given me various things to do to try and fix it. Really irritated with how much time this is taking out of my day. Always relied on Apple until now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Di Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Not flawless
customer_reviews.text: The earpiece rattle when receiving a call and it just makes it feel cheap, I’ve discovered it’s pretty normal as so many people complain on forums, not what you expect for the price, otherwise it’s good, not a major issue but it makes me question if did the right thing buying an overpriced phone which is not flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Marin

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal of the phone’s box.
customer_reviews.text: I got the product and the seal of the product was broken, though the phone looked fine but still it isn’t a good impression when you buy such an expensive phone the seal is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Manav Dawra

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like these products. Upgraded from an iPhone 8. Battery runs down quickly, but that’s probably cause i’ m accessing a lot of platforms. Amazon, great idea doing 6 monthly payment plan. Genius if you don’t want to fork out hundreds of pounds or take on an extortionate phone plan. Would do again if offered.
customer_reviews.author: kaza

customer_reviews.title: Where is document?
customer_reviews.text: I buy this phone, but get with him only phone box. I would like to ask where is my phone document?
customer_reviews.author: Aukse

customer_reviews.title: KRCS
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever purchased and even though I,m not tech savvy,I managed to transfer everything over from my old Vodafone android. You have to pay if you want the best but I paid £400 plus less than rrp and was wary I might of been purchasing a reconditioned phone. Phone turned up overnight (a week earlier than stated) and brand new. Can’t praise KRCS enough even though I,d never heard of them I would recommend them to anyone if my service was anything to go by.
customer_reviews.author: John Kilvington

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, terrible battery!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Wide screen (note that this is relative to an iPhone SE) Good graphics resolution Face recognition Cons: Had to get a replacement phone sent out because the first one’s battery was beyond terrible and wouldn’t charge past 27%! The phone arrived uncharged which suggests it’s very old stock. Perhaps not much of a con but the wider screen is a little too wide for my hand Not a bad phone overall but definitely overpriced for what it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Cess

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Phone
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my 6s of many years to this fantastic Xs ... wasn’t bothered about having the latest greatest as this phone was ahead of its time when first released. Phone arrived next day and I was pleased to discover that it had only been manufactured 1 month earlier. This will last me a good few years now on a sim only deal with a ridiculous amount of data. Do I miss the home button ... what home button ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Realdavemathews

customer_reviews.title: Great! No more android!
customer_reviews.text: We moved back from Samsung as we could no longer tolerate the constant bugs and inconsistencies within the operating system. Couldn’t be happier with the purchase and love being back on iOS. Great value for money and would recommend as a phone to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: 256gb same price as 64gb...BARGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical but a genuine Apple iPhone sold directly from Apple. Arrived new and unlocked in a sealed box with all the accessories (lightning charger, headphones, lightning to 3.5mm adapter etc). Managed to get a 256gb for the same price as you’d get a 64gb buying from Apple direct.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver G

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, worth the wait and save up!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the phone coming out in late 2018, the phone has 100% battery health when it was delivered and still does a few months later. Despite there being software that prevents overloading, I do only try and charge when it's between 50-80%; as this will increase its life expectancy. I was contemplating between the Xr and Xs but chose the more premium phone, which it truly is. The quality of the pictures is amazing (check out my Instagram @_i4dtail_), the feel of the glass and metal are exemplary and the general interface of the face id and simple interface is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of getting used to but a great phone
customer_reviews.author: AliDi

customer_reviews.title: Genuine product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal on this saving £250 versus apple store price!
customer_reviews.author: Mr H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Was initially unsure of getting a phone without the Touch ID as I have had iPods and iPhones for many years but the Face ID is much better than I anticipated. The phone is a good size. Still can be used with one hand. It takes good photos. Have loads of speakers for plenty of photos, video, apps and movies. It does everything you need it to do. Would highly recommend if you are on the 7/8 or lower and thinking of upgrading to a much more modern phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iPhone at Best deal is what you need
customer_reviews.text: So far, the phone is doing great. I love the portrait snaps captured by XS. Smooth experience. Best FaceID, even if you look at your phone from corner, it will just popup to unlock. LOL. Do not compare with 11 Pro coz for that you pay the price. But XS from my experience is far better than X., XR, XS Max and 11 in terms of photography, heating. charging, sizing and user experience. I got it for £ 629 in UK while in India this phone is still 83 K INR i.e. £ 905. Thankyou Amazon UK.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Singh

customer_reviews.title: Ms
customer_reviews.text: I got a second hand iphone xs, and I cannot activate it because of the previous owner' account, and I cannot ask for the return and refund on my order page! Right now the phone is totally useless to me, and I spend so many money on it!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Some faulties
customer_reviews.text: The phone what I’ve got was faulty I had to send it back. Something with the processong, because within two weeks did it at least five times. The screen went inactive and suddenly 10-30 sec later the phone did all of the tasks what you give to him, thinking the screen not working. Can you imagine how many apps opened in the same time? So might ot’s a good phone but not mine one.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Zsolt Csebi

customer_reviews.title: Good iPhone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This was the best price I have found for this iPhone. I had to wait a month to be back in stock but totally worth it. The purchase was not different in any way from buying directly from Apple as the warranty was with Apple, but I didn’t need to use it. Very happy with my phone, as expected from a new iPhone Best thing about this phone is the huge memory storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ana C.

customer_reviews.title: From new stock. Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: With apple no longer selling this I was worried about it being old stock. Checked the serial number and I was manufactured in April 2020. Good size. Can use one handed. Battery easily lasts the day. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr CJ B

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Bought on 2020. After all the 11 and pro but this is still my choice. Reasonable price, very good quality. Amazon gave me a sealed and activated on the day I bought. A month now and I'm very very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Van Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Good quality photos. I have had though a lot before buying it... Between the 11Pro or the XS. I am happy I went with the XS. The battery lasts a long time, so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Liliane H.

customer_reviews.title: Back to iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Glad I came back to iPhone, will not be going back to android until a worthy pixel phone is made.
customer_reviews.author: Ozgur O.

customer_reviews.title: Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions perfectly and had made sure My hands were clean and dry. The corner kept coming unstuck no matter how many times I smoothed it out. Eventually gave up and tried the other one. It had a flaw in the centre of the glass distorting the picture. Both went in the bin. Complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Neva A Houston

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice device! Lovely to use, great build quality. Infinitely better than my old 7 Plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price great phone why would you bother with the 11 thick bezels thick phone lcd 720 screen for same price as the Xs now bargain
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Got it at a reduction so almost half of the market price. Christmas gift. Fast delivery, sealed box , clean IMEI.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iPhone xs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone my daughter loves it Excellent value too saved me £300 The box was sealed brand new arrived on time x
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. I went for the 512gb model. After using it for the last few days I am very impressed. Face ID is very responsive. Great phone!
customer_reviews.author: Kalpesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product??
customer_reviews.text: Phone came and was faulty. I don’t no if it had been returned previously and they had tried to fix it? Something about it didn’t seem right.
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a 256GB model (£999). The 64GB model is this price from the apple store
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 product. Not much difference between xs and 11 pro
customer_reviews.author: varun negi

customer_reviews.title: Small phone excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Quick to set up and use. Camera is of a top quality and the pictures are second to none. Screen is crisp and clear. Overall great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket Man

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: No real upgrade on the iPhone 8. Certainly nothing worth paying ~£1k for unless upgrading from a iPhone 6 or earlier. Battery performance is still lacking for my liking. Facial recognition is a nifty feature but not really value for money
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Skelt

customer_reviews.title: I love my Apply iPhone XS!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone. It has excellent functions such as face recognition and good picture quality. It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iPhone
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? It’s an iPhone at a discounted price. Bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Turner

customer_reviews.title: EASY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. EASY TRANSFER OF DATA FROM OLD TO NEW PHONE. CAMERS AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone - so much better than the iPhone 6S it replaced. Paid by instalments too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, came very quickly even considering restrictions due to covid19. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly well: functions and looks like new. Battery life was 100% when I received it. Better for the environment too since it is second hand :)
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing. It’s fast, it has great battery life, does great pictures and gold color is so pretty, every time I look at it I’m just so happy I bought this iPhone 😁
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Magda

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the camera on the screen befor you turn the phone on as you tend to switch in on as you put the phone away
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a friend, he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend and he said he couldn't ask for any better!
customer_reviews.author: Davide Medico

customer_reviews.title: Good buying experience. Excellent supplier
customer_reviews.text: Good prompt communication and fast delivery. Product new and boxed as described. Usual Apple high standard iPhone. Many thanks
customer_reviews.author: A Bright

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Item was a bit cheaper than in apple. Delivery and other issues were not experienced.
customer_reviews.author: H Markvukaj

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best iPhone I owned so far and I absolutely love the 512gb capacity!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life came not with 100%, instead came with 99%. After few weeks It dropped to 96%. So the battery is broken.
customer_reviews.author: LaimisRad

customer_reviews.title: Lightning fast!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and great battery life! Ram management is superb and the camera is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Son and he loves it. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Worth it if you’re upgrading from iPhone 8, great camera and Face ID works well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful amazing phone very good. Face ID is the best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Downer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, very quick and smooth with Face ID working very well
customer_reviews.author: Ben Corbridge

customer_reviews.title: phone breaking within a month
customer_reviews.text: my phone has horizontal lines going acrossits screen randomly when i picked it up today.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate phone!
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate phone! Speed, quality, capability, battery life - all in one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arslan

customer_reviews.title: White iPhone xs 256
customer_reviews.text: Good product and quality. The delivery was really fast within one day!
customer_reviews.author: HUOYINGLUN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this from an iPhone7 and am so glad I did as is a beautiful phone. It isn't that much bigger than the iPhone7, which is what I wanted and is only slightly heavier. However the large screen makes it so much better. I love the no home button feature now I have got used to it, as it is so easy to just swipe up to return to something. Face recognition is so quick as well. I'm still investigating all the features, but the camera is fantastic. If you can afford it, I would certainly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Love the iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: Face ID works will. Can actually use it to unlock the phone whilst riding my bike wearing gloves. Its much faster than my Galaxy S7 It's genuine. I got it for £200 cheaper so went to Apple store to verify if its genuine or not. Cons: ITS TOO EXPENSIVE. iPhone XS 256 GB for £999. Cheaper than apple but more than double my previous phone: Galaxy S7 which I bought for £440.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but fragile
customer_reviews.text: At first I was not blown away, but after tweaking the settings and getting used to the new gestures, I’m a big fan. On the downside, after only a few months and a single low drop, I’ve chipped the corner of the screen. Oh for truly tough screens...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. J. WENZEL

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for about 6 weeks now, what a great phone! I was still on an iPhone 6 (which I’ve used for the past 4 years, that served me well) so this was an amazing upgrade for me. 256gb for under 1k is a good price, looks good, feels lovely, works fast, photos are excellent! Glad I made this purchase, would highly recommend if upgrading from any phone 3 - 4 years old!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Really was unsure about the value for money with this phone as you can get more storage and performance for less money from other phone companies. However this little phone has really surprised me! Super quick and responsive, great to have a little more storage for photos etc. Camera performs really really well. Overall really pleased, fantastic phone. Would recommend for anyone who is an apple person :)
customer_reviews.author: RGomes11

customer_reviews.title: My third iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I've been in Apple orbit since 1986 when I bought my first Mac. This is my third iPhone and it confirm why I, like so many others worldwide, are just totally committed to Apple. It works so well, its totally integrated with all my other devices (Apple Watch to iMac) and its just a brilliant piece of kit. Face recognition works brilliantly and saves the hassle with fingerprints and passwords etc. Buying the previous version has also saved me a load of money.
customer_reviews.author: toptone

customer_reviews.title: Awful battery
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted an iPhone, saved enough money to buy one and I chose this after reading a plethora of positive reviews. However, the battery life is awful despite it being commended in many reviews. This experience has put me off buying an iPhone again. I'm quite happy with my huawei, which was a fraction of the price and is great. I am still awaiting my full refund for this product as it was just horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good phone, has a good size for holding. Works perfectly and is very easy to use even though it doesn’t have a home button. The face recognition works really well and the battery lasts the whole day. However I would recommend purchasing a good case and screen protector as it is quite fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is original Apple product.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of is original. Is not round and smooth like my wife model. Working fine but nor sure if this is a original.
customer_reviews.author: Michas Dobiecki

customer_reviews.title: Great IPhone
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of getting used to and I really miss the button but face recognition is great. Love the quality of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lowe

customer_reviews.title: iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful phone which is just quality. Screen display is excellent and battery life is impressive. Easy to set up and it’s really quick to operate. Very happy as this is a quality phone for a decent price. Arrived within two days. Quality service
customer_reviews.author: cookster623

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Never had such an expensive phone. It’s my first iPhone and would not exchange it for nothing. Simply brilliant. And if you complete a free online course of how to use it properly, it’ll just blow your mind how smart of a phone it really is. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander.

customer_reviews.title: Apple quality. Apple price
customer_reviews.text: Its a great phone but way too expensive for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz Jozefczyk

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. If I had bought iphone from apple then i would have only got 64gb for same price. Saves a few hundred
customer_reviews.author: Listerben1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iPhone xs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stylish iPhone xs very happy, delivery was fast and I got it for a good price thanks amazon uk.
customer_reviews.author: DULLBOIZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use
customer_reviews.text: As always I like the apps and functions its easy to use and great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Russell

customer_reviews.title: not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: way too expensive, half as good as it looks. 3 minutes into a game and it gets so hot. my advise don't spend your money on this overpriced phone.
customer_reviews.author: michie

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone very. Really great at photos and speaker is much louder.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn 84

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Love the XS iPhone, such a shame it is no longer made.
customer_reviews.author: J Denman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and with a discount. What’s not to like.
customer_reviews.author: MinimeDK

customer_reviews.title: Best price out there
customer_reviews.text: It's an iPhone - quality is 100% and I got a good deal from Amazon, compared to Apple Store.
customer_reviews.author: Vip

customer_reviews.title: As above
customer_reviews.text: Great phone would recommend it maybe a little expensive but I am happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Richard Llewellin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Replacement phone for the wife, got to us fast, product as expected.
customer_reviews.author: AP

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone XS (256GB) - Silver
feature_bullets: IP68 dust and water resistant (maximum depth of 2 meters up to 30 minutes)
12MP dual cameras with dual OIS and 7MP TrueDepth front camera—Portrait mode, Portrait Lighting, Depth Control, and Smart HDR
Face ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
A12 Bionic with next-generation Neural Engine
Wireless charging — works with Qi chargers
iOS 12 with Memoji, Screen Time, Siri Shortcuts and Group FaceTime
